General.Name: OT Logistics S.A
General.Description: OT Logistics S.A. provides a range of transport, freight forwarding, and logistics services in Germany, Belgium, the Netherlands, Austria, Poland, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, and Hungary. It provides reloading and storage services based on the inland port in Wroclaw and sea terminals in Swinoujscie, Gdynia; and the Croatian port of Rijeka. The company also organizes inland transport of various cargos, as well as provides services related to the rental of equipment for hydrotechnical works; cargo handling services; services for rail transport; and intermodal transport, including sea, rail, and road transport. It owns and manages a fleet of inland vessels. The company was formerly known as Odratrans S.A. and changed its name to OT Logistics S.A. in 2012. OT Logistics S.A. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Szczecin, Poland.
